alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:31PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through 100 PM PDT... At 1231 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 32 miles northwest of Grass Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for north central Nevada.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
